name: GSAP Scroll Animations
author: Blueprint 8

sections.description: Simple, beginner-friendly GSAP scroll animations for WordPress. Add animations to any element using HTML IDs with an easy admin interface. Features 13 animation types, timing controls, and accessibility support with prefers-reduced-motion detection. Advanced users can still use class-based animations.
sections.installation: Upload the plugin folder to /wp-content/plugins/ and activate through the WordPress Plugins menu.
